name: ScienceDB (Science Data Bank)
description: ScienceDB is an open and trustworthy platform for data storage and publishing, which aims to serve the global open scientific data sharing. It provides services for storing, long-term preservation, publishing, sharing, and accessing scientific data. The platform supports multiple data sharing methods and diverse data licensing agreements, aligning with the FAIR principles and fostering a culture of data sharing within the scientific community.
owner_name: Chinese Academy of Sciences Computing and Network Information Center (CNIC)
